content.question: The diagrams show portions of three different circuits, with currents in some of the circuit branches indicated. Which of the following correctly compares the currents <math alttext="I sub X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></msub></math>, <math alttext="I sub Y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></msub></math>, and <math alttext="I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">Z</mi></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="I sub X equals I sub Y, which equals I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub X equals I sub Y, which is greater than I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub X is greater than I sub Y, which equals I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

<math alttext="I sub X is greater than I sub Y, which is greater than I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="I sub X is greater than I sub Y, which equals I sub Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>X</mtext></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Y</mtext></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>I</mi><mtext>Z</mtext></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
